node.title: Storage Nodes
node.content: The Nodes which CSI Driver & Local Disk Manager (LDM) have been installed, please installed DRDB to enable HA LV (Local Volume).

pool.title: Storage Pool
pool.content: This is a disk resource pool composed of different disk types (LVM, Disk), where a storage pool contains multiple node storage pools underneath it.

localVolume.title: Local Volume
localVolume.content: Local volume: Corresponds to the LV (Local Volume) resource on the node. When high availability is enabled, a local volume corresponds to 2 data volume replicas.
